title: Did Pelosi say that he was "a danger'that voters would let Trump's fate be decided in 2020?
subtitle: The President of the United States took a misleading phrase from the host of Fox News and claimed that it was a direct quote.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: President Nancy Belusi of the United States House of Representatives said it was dangerous to allow voters to decide the fate of President Donald Trump in the 2020 elections.
